Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to legislation implementing collective bargaining agreements
Summary: Provides that legislation which enacts or amends any provision of law for the purpose of implementing an agreement between the state and an employee organization shall be limited to the provisions necessary to implement such agreement.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to legislation implementing collective bargaining agreements
